This page lists predefined [[texture atlas]]es which have been removed from {{el|je}}. Several of these may still exist in {{el|be}}.

== Removed from all current editions ==

=== <samp>items.png</samp> ===
{{main|items.png}}

<samp>items.png</samp> was used for storing the textures of [[item]]s.

=== <samp>terrain.png</samp> ===
{{main|terrain.png}}

<samp>terrain.png</samp> was used for storing the textures of [[block]]s.

== Removed from Java Edition, still present in Bedrock Edition ==
{{merge|Texture atlas/Predefined|section=1}}
{{exclusive|bedrock|section=1}}

=== <samp>map_icons.png</samp> ===
{{info needed section|Console Edition had its own exclusive progress}}

=== <samp>moon_phases.png</samp> ===
This file stores all eight phases of the [[moon]]. The [[sun]]'s texture is a separate file.

{{HistoryTable
|{{HistoryLine|java indev}}
|{{HistoryLine||20100211-2327|[[File:Moon (texture) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] The moon has been implemented.<br>At this point, there is only one moon phase, and therefore only one texture file: <samp>moon.png</samp>}}
|{{HistoryLine|java}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.0.0|dev=Beta 1.9 Prerelease 4|[[File:201110131706 moon_phases.png|128px]] Added <samp>moon_phases.png</samp> with the addition of different moon phases.<br>The file <samp>moon.png</samp> still remains, but is no longer used.}}
|{{HistoryLine|||dev=Beta 1.9 Prerelease 6|[[File:201111102025 moon_phases.png|128px]] Updated <samp>moon_phases.png</samp> to have square moons.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.6.1|dev=13w24a|The unused <samp>moon.png</samp> file has been [[Java Edition 1.6.1/Resource pack changes|removed]].}}
}}

=== <samp>kz.png</samp> ===
{{main|kz.png}}

<samp>kz.png</samp> is used for storing the textures of [[painting]]s.

=== <samp>particles.png</samp> ===
{{main|particles.png}}

<samp>particles.png</samp> is used for storing the textures of most [[particle]]s. Two other atlases, <samp>explosion.png</samp> and <samp>sweep.png</samp>, were used for respectively storing explosion and sweeping attack particles.{{only|java}}
